headline: Carvana, Comfort Systems, CRH To Join S&P 500 Index. The Stocks Are Jumping.
summary: Carvana, Comfort Systems and CRH jumped on news they'll join the S&P 500 index before the open on Dec. 22. Vertiv and SoFi are notable snubs.

raw.headline: Carvana, Comfort Systems, CRH To Join S&P 500 Index. The Stocks Are Jumping.
raw.summary: Carvana, Comfort Systems and CRH jumped on news they'll join the S&P 500 index before the open on Dec. 22. Vertiv and SoFi are notable snubs.

headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid MAR and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Marriott has followed the market’s trajectory closely, rising in tandem with the S&P 500 over the past six months. The stock has climbed by 13.9% to $295.98 per share while the index has gained 15.3%.
